title: Title Generator with Machine Learning
description: In this article, I will use the YouTube trending videos dataset and the Python programming language to train a model of text generation language using machine learning, which will be used for the task of title generator for youtube videos or even for your blogs.Title generator is a natural language processing task and is a central issue for several machine learning, including text synthesis, speech to text, and conversational systems. Also, Read – Machine Learning Full Course for free.To build a model for the task of title generator or a text generator, the model should be trained to learn the probability of a word occurring, using words that have already appeared in the sequence as context.
